long_description: Road warriors of the world rejoice! The REI Quantum Daypack is built with you in mind. It holds a laptop, legal-size documents and plenty of gear. 100% post-consumer recycled PET fabrics are tough enough to withstand the urban grind and soft enough to feel good doing it. Fits up to 16 in. laptop in a fully padded pocket; legal-size documents also fit easily in the main compartment. Easy access to the laptop sleeve through either top or side zippers makes getting through airport security lines a breeze. Voluminous main compartment has space for all your mobile office essentials on weekdays and doubles as a weekend getaway bag once you're off the clock. Top and side handles offer solid grab points; wide backpack straps, adjustable waistbelt and padded mesh back panel combine to make long hauls less taxing. Exterior zippered pocket fits travel documents, tickets and boarding passes; mesh side pocket accommodates a 1-liter bottle. Ballistic nylon bottom panel is durable and foam padding protects contents. Reflective trim creates great visibility for active commuters; webbing loop provides reliable attachment point for blinking LED light (sold separately). REI Quantum Daypack includes a fully featured organizer panel with multiple pockets for pens, electronics and small essentials. Special buy.
short_description: Road warriors of the world rejoice! The REI Quantum Daypack is built with you in mind. It holds a laptop, legal-size documents and plenty of gear.
